remarks: (( From SO's determinants branch )).  TODO:  Appropriate description to be added!  (Contributed by SO, 14-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mrcmndind.ch $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
mrcmndind.th $e |- ( x = ( y .+ z ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
mrcmndind.ta $e |- ( x = .0. -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
mrcmndind.et $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> et ) ) $.
mrcmndind.0g $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` M ) $.
mrcmndind.pg $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
mrcmndind.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
mrcmndind.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Mnd ) $.
mrcmndind.g $e |- ( ph -> G C_ B ) $.
mrcmndind.k $e |- ( ph -> B = ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` M ) ) ` G ) ) $.
mrcmndind.i1 $e |- ( ph -> ta ) $.
mrcmndind.i2 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ y e. B /\ z e. G ) /\ ch ) -> th ) $.
mrcmndind.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
mrcmndind $p |- ( ph -> et ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .0. x $.
$d A x $.
$d B y z $.
$d G y z $.
$d ch x z $.
$d et x $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d ps y z $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
